product.title: Distributor Cap - OEM - FJ40, FJ45, FJ60, FJ62, FJ80 1980-1992
product.body_html: OEM Toyota - Fits FJ40/45, FJ60/62, FJ80 - 8/1980 - 8/1992 Time and general use will take its toll on your ignition system. Corrosion buildup on the distributor cap terminals can cause weak spark, erratic operation, even misfires. Replace the distributor cap as a part of your complete ignition tune-up to get the best efficiency possible! - Original cap, uses original clips for fastening to distributor housing. - Cylinder numbers marked into cap for a guess-free installation. *Tech Tip: There are many factors that contribute to how well your Cruiser performs. If you are considering replacing the distributor cap, you may also want to look at the distributor rotor, spark plugs, wires, ignition timing, fuel filter, carburetor settings, and check compression. All of these components work together to give you the best possible performance and MPG.
